Name: ASHISH
Title: DEVINE
Review: If you have lost everything including hope than come to this place , haare ka sahara shyam hamara will solve all your problems

Name: sree143in
Title: big tempel
Review: Shyam mandir inkachiguda is very famous place in this area. mmust visit a very big temple place in the city.

Name: GLOBALSEAS
Title: radhe radhe
Review: one of the old temple of lord krishna located at kachiguda , nice place to visit along with other small temples inside the temple , shiva and hanuman temple is there in this temple .

Name: HARISH
Title: jai khatu shyam
Review: shyam temple beside kachiguda station is famous for khatu shyam temple...with hanuman,durga mata,shiv ,shani temple are inside temple ground.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: nice and good
Review: Well maintained and it has lot of small temples inside of various gods and outside temple they manage footwear.Its nice and pleasant inside

Name: idea614354
Title: Peaceful
Review: A good built and beautiful architecture of temple very peaceful and  good. people maintains q line for darshan.

Name: Sumit S
Title: Divine feeling
Review: just near kacheguda station is the shyam mandir. You feel very good visiting this place. Anyone going through kacheguda must visit this place

Name: convwp
Title: Peaceful and holy temple
Review: This was very old temple near railway station. Many devotees came here for Praying. Good place to visit. We have visit in morning time.

Name: Tarang G
Title: Religious feeling
Review: We go there on baaras and we feel delighted after visiting this temple as people keeps singing bhajans. It’s a huge temple , if you love to visit temples than it is one of the main spot in Hyderabad

Name: srinath18
Title: “Peaceful temple”
Review: Located at kachiguda center of the city Shyam Mandir totally peaceful temple in this city visited with friends

Name: Manish K
Title: Nice temple, located right next to the Kacheguda station
Review: The Shyam Mandir is dedicated to Khatu Shyam and is located right next to the busy Kacheguda railway station in Hyderabad. That said, one inside the temple complex, the noise and hustle outside are immediately forgotten.The temple is very well-maintained and contains a number of shrines, dedicated to various Gods. Facilities for devotees are good, with adequate drinking water as well as footwear deposit provided. There is some climbing of stairs involved, which may not be convenient for senior citizens, but otherwise, the temple is worth a short visit.

Name: Mintstar
Title: Peaceful temple
Review: Very old temple situated near Kachiguda railway Station...earlier it was known as veeranna gutta later changed the temple name to Shyam Baba temple...Very well maintained...it has goshala as well... has multiple temples and are well maintained...

Name: Gaurab2017
Title: Holy Temple - Must go place in Kachiguda
Review: You can have darshan of almost all gods. Been to this temple almost 10 times till now. Very near to Kachiguda Railway station and bus stop.

Name: Im O
Title: Shyam mandir
Review: Shayam mandir is beautifull temple devoted to radha krishan ji.temple is well maintenaned and nice to visit best to visit during sandhya arti

Name: sandeep g
Title: good
Review: a good place to visit to have a peace full mind and for mental peace , good place to visit. go with family

Name: rockzzM77
Title: Amazing place
Review: This ttempl is amazing, if you want to spend some time in peace and want to release your stress than must visit here.

Name: occlusion_vikas
Title: disgusting !except for its a temple badly managed
Review: the access is poor and badly behaved staff and arrogant behaviour . no parking available the hall is good and well ventilated but the cooks are horrible and absolutely unclean and unhygenic food

Name: sudha966
Title: A temple in Kachiguda
Review: shyam mandir near kachiguda station is a good place to visit.  the atmosphere here is very peaceful and everyone loves going to this place again and again

Name: Gugan_Ilango
Title: A Beautiful Temple
Review: Shyam Mandir is a beautiful temple and very clean temple. also is very quiet and have pooja at early morning

Name: Rita K
Title: Jai Shri Shyam
Review: We visited this temple at Hyderabad for second time and really liked darshan and cleanliness, prasad was also very tasty. Hanuman and Shiv temple in the same campus is very good.

Name: chittajallu r
Title: The utmost devine experience
Review: The Sham Mandir situated at kachiguda Hyderabad , on a hillock called veeranna gutta opposite kachiguda railway station. Its a serene devine place of different Hindu temples and the main deity Sham baba fulfils all your wishes once you durrender to him and in Ganesh temple the murthy of Ganesh is beautifully carved in marble stone looks like ready to bless the devotees.The shivji and Hanuman temples are equally devine and powerful. In this temple complex there will be some kind or the other devine programmes conducted in the open space, which give solace to the soul of audience.A must place to visit in Hyderabad

Name: BRKanth
Title: Shyam Mandir in City
Review: Visited this place while going out of station  from Kachiguda. Place is neatly maintained but sometimes lift do not work and could be difficult for old people. Overall grt place.

Name: chandrasg
Title: peaceful place
Review: the shyam mandir at kachiguda is a good place to pray in peace and have some solace. though it is situated in a busy, boisterous area,  once you enter the temple in the evening, you find the place very peaceful. there is also free lunch provided to the poor in the afternoon. its not crowded most of the time and you can have a good darshan and meditate if you like.

Name: anuradha2013
Title: Quite, peaceful and devine
Review: I normally am a temple goer and like to sit inside the Garbh gruha's. I also like the idol's, their dress and ornaments down south. It is always lovely for me.

Name: Prasad B
Title: Spiritual place :-)
Review: Place is simple and spiritual ..and well maintained with sanity and state of art architecture..A must place to visit

Name: Anand R
Title: Shyam Mandir
Review: its not popular as it is but TS Govt must promote the toursim this place would be better attractions

Name: jaggu536
Title: place of devotees
Review: this is a famous shyaam mandir near kacheguda railway station. famous and also the attraction in the centre for the travellers and tourists

Name: Yuvaraj V
Title: Nice and must go place.
Review: Nice and must go place.Very near to kachiguda railway station. Well maintained and peaceful place.Must go to to feel the spirituality.

Name: Krupali J
Title: Very calm place to visit !!
Review: I loved visiting this place, as the place was very silent and calm, though its located near to railway station. Personally, I found this place very calm and peaceful. One must visit this place.

Name: Hemanth Kumar Reddyshetty
Title: Peaceful Place
Review: I visit this temple 3-4 times a year. The temple has host of gods from Jagannath Swamy, Shiva, Ganesh, Navagrahas, etc. Even though this temple is located very near to Kachiguda Railway station, which is a buzzing place, I find this temple to be very silent and peaceful place. It is spread across vast area with many small temples around and I strongly suggest you to visit this place, if you haven't yet done so.There are lot of restaurants around movie theaters near by to this temple, so you may plan your weekend appropriately.

Name: rly241181
Title: Excellent Temple
Review: Nice place to go. Feels really peace and clam. Many gods Temple are there inside. Bajrang Bali, Shiva,Ganesha,Krishna,Shanidev, Durga maa.

Name: Kavitha R
Title: Worth a visit
Review: Situated just few meters from Kachiguda railway station, this temple is a worth your time. A very well maintained place with lift facility. The main sanctum is for Khatu shyam, grandson of Bhima.He had obtained a boon from Krishna to the effect that he would be known by Krishna's own name (Shyam) in the Kaliyuga era (presently ongoing) and worshiped.The sanctum is at a height but we can see the deity from the bottom itself, fully adorned in various flower garlands.There are separate temples for Ganesha,Hanuman,Durga,Shiva and Navagrahas inside the compound.

Name: Chandrapc
Title: calm and peaceful
Review: Eventhough this temple is opposite to the kachiguda station, calm environment  and peaceful atmosphere. it is having another name as veeranna gutta famous  oldest hanuman mandir is builtn inside

Name: sandy19880712
Title: Beautiful place
Review: Beautiful place to visit the temple and see the location inside will feel some peacefull and relax at any time i visited when i stay kachiguda.

Name: Jagadishwar R
Title: Spirirtual
Review: One & only Shyam Mandir in Hyderabad. Serene place quiet & peaceful , you have to spend some time here, there are other temples on this small hillock, One of the oldest Hanuman mandir is situated here, it is also called Veeranna Gutta. Lift is available for old & handicapped persons.

Name: NilabhTripathy
Title: Awesome temple
Review: One of the best temples in hyderabad. really clean and you will find peace in that temple. such an energetic environment with 7-8 different temples inside the premises.

Name: h12564
Title: Nice
Review: Very peaceful, even-though near to Kachiguda railway station.Tasty prasadam as well :)Can spend some time in that quiet atmosphere

Name: Kunal_2799
Title: Amazing
Review: Amazing Place to have relaxed , peaceful and calm environment, Mind will bed in spiritual state, and feel like linked to god

Name: Praveen K
Title: Peaceful and well maintained temple near kachiguda station
Review: a good temple near kachiguda station and is maintained well. This is on a small hillock just next to the kachiguda station.

Name: sudmaha
Title: Are you arriving at kacheguda station?
Review: This was the first place i visited when reached hyderabad. just opposite to the kacheguda railway station and good way to start the journey.

Name: guddu1954
Title: reverred by all hindus
Review: This temple complex is having many temples,but the main temple of Shri Shyam baba temple  is the centre of attraction.the temple also runs free charities.

Name: Karan K
Title: One of the best temples in Hyderabad
Review: From the start to the end, this place is just Lovely.!! the entire temple is clad in white glowing marble. it houses Beautiful temples of Ganeshji, Hanumanji, Shivji, Nau Grah, Durga Mata & the biggest one of Shree Sham Baba, one of the most peaceful sights. and the moment u enter the temple be prepared to be memorized by the awesome fragrance of the flowers & ithar this is a must visit place.

Name: Vikram A
Title: Beautiful Shyam Baba temple at hillock
Review: Its a beautiful temple at top of a hillock. Made with white Marble has idols of many deities. We visit it regularly.Its well maintained and located near Kachiguda Rly station. Must visit in Hyderabad.

Name: KASI VENKOBA RAO
Title: Temple on Hillock...Looking so Good
Review: Shyam Mandir dedicated to Lord Krishna is abode on a small hillock near Kacheguda Railway Station, Hyderabad. This small hillock was formerly known as 'Veeranna Gutta", meaning a hillock by the name Veeranna.The temple is open from 6.00 AM to 12.00 noon and from 5.00 PM to 10.00 PM every day. The attraction at the temple is the Bhajan by the devotees.in the evening. People are admired with the Bhajan.The temple complex comprises of Lord Sri Shyam Baba, Lord Sri Radha Krishna, Lord Sri Shiva, Lord Sri Anjaneya, Lord Sri Kaal, Bhairava, Amba Mata, Navagraha.The complex looks so attractive in the night with illumination. The hillock has a few steps to reach the temple. No doubt, this is one of the main attractions in the city of Hyderabad and one cannot afford to miss this temple and go without blessed by the God....

Name: Naganna Travel and Food Expert
Title: Nice and Big Krishna Mandir......
Review: Krishna mandir, called gutta in kachiguda, near to Railway station... this temple has most of the Gods and the prasadam and daily annadhanam is the activites been performed at here....

Name: wander93
Title: Beautiful
Review: This is an amazing temple. There's something really about the hymns sung at Shyam Mandor in devotion to Lord Krishna. Would recommend visiting around 6.30PM in case you are planning to attend the aarti.

Name: sriramsatuluri
Title: Reminds me of my childhood days.
Review: I still remember, when I was in school, I used to visit Shyam mandir often and sing aarti with crowd at 7pm. The best part was, the prasadam post aarti. :) In spite of being amidst heavy traffic zone, you will be lost in divinity when you enter inside the temple. You will be surrounded with some cosmic waves. Love this place.I would always recommend this place, even if you can take an hour aside from your schedules, you will know what I was talking about.Radhe KrishnaJai Sri KrishnaHare Krishna Hare Krishna

Name: shree1438
Title: Shyam Baba Temple
Review: The temple is well maintain by Kanchi Kamkoti and we will find lord ganesha, lord Veerabhadra, Lord Shyam Baba, Lord Shiva, Lord Hanuman and Navagraha temples at the same premises.

Name: Karthik A
Title: A good divine place
Review: Shyam Mandir is one of the well maintained temples. This is located near kachiguda station. There are different gods in the temple. The temple priest some of them will behave odd this you can except because this maintained by private. The atmosphere is very good. The morning Aarti time is around 8. Morning and evening you can see more crowd. The do serve free bhojan for poor everyday i think. The will conduct some camps regularly for physiotherapy.

Name: Avinash P
Title: must visit
Review: not too far from kachiguda cross roads and situated right opposite to kachiguda railway station, this temple is a must visit. very well managed, organised and neat. we went on a sunday afternoon and it wasnt much of a crowd. generally devotees were with families. the staff is helpful and courteous. no signs of commercialization and i pray it remains so. there are a few other deities in the premises that you should visit.there was some free medical camp organised when we visited so it appears the temple undertakes social responsibility seriously.

Name: vibha123
Title: Serene Temple and a Must visit places
Review: This temple is just 100 m from The Kachiguda Railway station.It has various gods apart from Shyam/Lord Sree Krishna.A very good and pleasant place and if you visit it in the evening it will be more good and it will give a very good look with lights all around the temple. Must see place while you are in Hyderabad.I have been there just once but feel like going there all the time i get chance.The best part about this place is that you have serene beauty of the God, Peace, Greenary and very less people which makes it a prefered place to be when you want to stay away from the sounds of the world.

Name: guddu3101
Title: Very Good Place To Visit
Review: This temple is just 100 m from The Kachiguda Railway station.It has various gods apart from Shyam/Lord Sree Krishna.A very good and pleasant place and if you visit it in the evening it will be more good and it will give a very good look with lights all around the temple.Must see place while you are in Hyderabad.
